apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this depiction of a couple with a heart showcases two women with medium-dark and medium skin tones, rendered with Apple’s signature realistic lighting and soft, rounded edges. A bright, glossy heart emblem is prominently placed between them, its form enhanced by subtle 3D shading that gives it a luminous quality. This emoji beautifully represents love, partnership, and shared affection, offering a visually warm and inclusive symbol of romance within Apple’s thoughtfully designed emoji set.
